archimate:Requirement.name: 4.23.4 Systems Development Security Operations Requirements Control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Business requirements should take into account security-related operations including: a) security architecture principles (e.g. 'secure by design', 'defence in depth', 'secure by default', 'default deny' and 'fail secure') b) secure coding guidance (e.g. OWASP Top 10 Most Critical Web Application Security Risks and CWE/SANS Top 25 Most Dangerous Software Errors) c) privacy by design and privacy by default principles (e.g. how to obtain consent to process data, how to opt-in to data processing and how to present privacy notices) d) operational security directives (e.g. which events to log and where, documentation to produce and instructions to be provided to the information security team).
